scripts.release:major: npm run build && npm version $(semver $npm_package_version -i major) && npm publish --tag latest && git push
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && npm version $(semver $npm_package_version -i minor) && npm publish --tag latest && git push
scripts.release:patch: npm run build && npm version $(semver $npm_package_version -i patch) && npm publish --tag latest && git push
